main event: A civilian observer sighted a bright object with two flashing lights in Dayton, Ohio on February 7, 1968.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 1.5 hours and appeared nearly stationary., The colors reported were white, red, and green., The observer had experience watching similar phenomena at night., There were two confirmed witnesses to the observation., The sighting was reported to the Air Force for further investigation.
sighted object: a bright object with two flashing lights
